review: Great little device. I works fairly well, but I only rated it 3 stars because of one issue. I have many different wireless devices that connect to my network at home. While my main router is in the basement I have a wireless extension to better reach my whole house. Every device I have has had flawless connection on the top floor. However this is the only device that consistently buffers or stops playing because of "slow" connection. I know this can't be as I have many time ran a connection test with other devices and I get well over the minimum to stream video. I don't know if it's a defective device or a software issue but it gets pretty annoying.
author: Amazon Customer
